briefTitle: Test for Pre Operative Skin Preparations
officialTitle: Test for Pre Operative Skin Preparations: ChloraPrep Triple Swabsticks, Hibiclens and Sterile Triple Swabsticks (Using Sterile Deionized Water)

interventions.name: CHG 2% w/v & IPA 70% v/v, swabstick (3 @ once).
CHG 2% w/v & IPA 70% v/v swab applied sequentially
Aqueous CHG 4% w/v applied according to mfr's directions
Sterile swabstick with sterile water (3 @ once)

summary: Compare 2 application techniques of ChloraPrep Swabstick--3 swabsticks at once versus 3 swabsticks used sequentially. Hibiclens applied according to the manufacturer's directions. Sterile swabsticks (wetted with sterile deionizd water) applied using the same method as the ChloraPrep Swabstick.

primaryOutcome.measure: log10 Reductions From Baseline for Each Test Parameter in CFU (Colony Forming Unit)/cm2 on Inguinal and Abdominal Sites
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 10 minutes and 6 hours after application of test solutions
